messages.message: Do we have any shareable plans around our migration to Python 3? C1 rightly pointed out that 2.7 EOLs in a few months and they’re worried about their security auditors flagging future releases.
Related to this: are we making any plans about what will happen with UDFs? Like, will we support 2.7 and 3.x for awhile, or will all UDFs have to port as well?
@dlluncor is the person to ask about this I believe
Hey Paul, let me share the state of the project and create a Confluence page for it
Awesome @dlluncor — I expect this is going to come up with increasing frequency as we near EOL of 2.7, so it would be great to know the state of things / future plans
